channel.title: Sweet idea for a laptop
channel.description:
i got this awesome idea for a laptop. here are the main features: 1000gb hard drive 3GB ram 4gb cd-rom compatible wireless dsl via cingular (free internet after 7 or 9 and weekends) windows 98 3rd edition (yes, it will be 98 with access to xp files) interchangeable skins for the computer (you can create ur own) has internal slots for xbox,xbox360,ps2,ps3,gamecube, and dreamcast external nes,snes,gameboy,gba,etc. triple threat weaponry to keep thieves and hackers out has a hacking database that can hack into practically everything
ADD OTHER SPECS IF U WANT I WANT THIS TO BE THE BESTEST COMPUTER IN THE WORLD

item.title: Sweet idea for a laptop
item.dc:creator: @zsakul2 zsakul2
item.description:
@zsakul2 wrote:

i posted this earlier… everything anyone is saying is nearly non-realistic so i like mine

uhh i would like to see a thing not only have a computer recycle bin but if you got the the lets call the icon (rl) recycle bin as in real life (rl) it would empty out the trash in any room in the house and also it would have plasmaton lasers and a anti sister and brother shield and anti dad’s stupid wiccan talks and it have a ultra speakers the size of texas !and it’d have 20 built in 70 feet plasma tvs! and also it’d have a thing were it would scatter my adams to any place in the world at 3 times the rate speed of light and sound and it has a built in rocket launcher and if someone else fingerprints touched the door sides mine automattically a plasma ray gun would shoot whoever came in! and i’d have a little pad i could stamp their fingers on to get their fingerprint were i could put it in side slot to make it were it would automattically let them in when they touch doorknob and it have built in 70 security cameras lol and it would have last but not least a software with a dellicate ray that would size up some atom sized pa :o rticals of dust in the room clean my room and all the dirt go into a machine making anyone in the world i wanted in my room like a clone of them and i could do anything with it and it’d be alive! now that would be a big ass laptop!

Read full topic

item.title: Sweet idea for a laptop
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

[quote=“runes war, post:1, topic:2894”]i got this awesome idea for a laptop. here are the main features:
1000gb hard drive
3GB ram
4gb cd-rom compatible
wireless dsl via cingular (free internet after 7 or 9 and weekends)
windows 98 3rd edition (yes, it will be 98 with access to xp files)
interchangeable skins for the computer (you can create ur own)
has internal slots for xbox,xbox360,ps2,ps3,gamecube, and dreamcast
external nes,snes,gameboy,gba,etc.
triple threat weaponry to keep thieves and hackers out
has a hacking database that can hack into practically everything

ADD OTHER SPECS IF U WANT I WANT THIS TO BE THE BESTEST COMPUTER IN THE WORLD[/quote]

While were at it why not give it Artificial Intelligence?

I suggest Plutonium Rod Battery, 70000000 Hours of Battery Life, You’ll never have to charge again!, Either that or you annihilate your entire neighbourhood…

Read full topic
